faqs.question: Do landscaping services include maintenance?
faqs.answer: Yes, many providers offer ongoing maintenance packages alongside initial installation. You can choose a one-time project or a monthly upkeep plan.

faqs.question: Can I install a garden with artificial turf?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Artificial turf is a popular choice in the UAE for low-maintenance green spaces, and many providers on Homezy specialize in its installation.
